name: coulomb-panel
description: Panel GUI component for Coulomb apps developed at Ribose
author: Ribose Inc. <open.source@ribose.com>

scripts.prepublish: rm -rf dist; tsc; cp package-dist.json dist/package.json; rsync -avm --include='*.js' --include='*.scss' --include='*.css' --include='*.d.ts' -f 'hide,! */' ./src/ ./dist
